name: Calculate Bonusly monthly points in Google Sheets
description: Make will list all Bonusly users and count their number of bonuses for a given time interval. Then, the result is saved in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GaTXiFveA5IwgJfotRKaZkM3fOywYAU4AndzTECZ7ME/edit?usp=sharing).
